title: SET_MP_GAMER_TAGS_USE_VEHICLE_BEHAVIOR
content:
0x7A27BC93// SetMpGamerTagsUseVehicleBehavior
void SET_MP_GAMER_TAGS_USE_VEHICLE_BEHAVIOR(bool enabled);Parameters:enabled: Whether tags should use normal game behavior. Default is true.Sets whether all tags should group (normal game behavior) or should remain independent and above each ped's respective head when in a vehicle.
